Posts.Content: amylovesstu wrote: Does anyone have any ideas on what this could actually be? It is a huge lump that has been growing since the lumpectomy that the doctors have seriously ignored until now. I've had 3 chemotherapy treatments and now the lump has became as big and hard as a softball, red, bruised and painful. On antibiotic for a week, no improvement. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Massive lump after lumpectomy amylovesstu marann

Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2012 02:46PM amylovesstu wrote: Thanks Beesie; it sounds like more of the hemotoma; but my doctor will not fill me in on it; he's gonna do surgery in the morning and put a drain tube in now....stops my chemo for a while but can't wait to get some relief...Thank you soo much for the helpful information!! Blessings to you!!
